mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chi_tiet_nhap_hang(sys_id_inbound, ma_pr, ma_po, sys_id_khach_hang, sys_id_san_pham, so_luong, gia, tong_chi_phi, ngay_nhap_du_kien) VALUES (#{maInBound}, #{maPR}, #{maPO}, #{sysIdKhachHang}, #{sysIdSanPham}, #{soLuong}, #{gia}, #{tongChiPhi}, #{ngayNhapDuKien});
mapper.update: UPDATE chi_tiet_nhap_hang SET ma_pr = #{maPR}, sys_id_khach_hang = #{sysIdKhachHang}, sys_id_san_pham = #{sysIdSanPham}, so_luong = #{soLuong}, gia = #{gia}, tong_chi_phi = #{tongChiPhi}, ngay_nhap_du_kien = #{ngayNhapDuKien} WHERE sys_id_chi_tiet_nhap_hang = #{sysIdChiTietNhapHang}
mapper.select: SELECT sys_id_chi_tiet_nhap_hang, sys_id_inbound, ma_pr, ma_po, sys_id_khach_hang, sys_id_san_pham, so_luong, gia, tong_chi_phi, ngay_nhap_du_kien FROM chi_tiet_nhap_hang;

SELECT ct.sys_id_chi_tiet_nhap_hang, ct.sys_id_inbound, ct.ma_pr, ct.ma_po, kh.sys_id_khach_hang, ten_khach_hang, sp.sys_id_san_pham, sp.ten_san_pham, ct.so_luong, ct.gia, ct.tong_chi_phi, ct.ngay_nhap_du_kien FROM chi_tiet_nhap_hang ct JOIN san_pham sp ON ct.sys_id_san_pham = sp.sys_id_san_pham JOIN khach_hang kh ON ct.sys_id_khach_hang = kh.sys_id_khach_hang JOIN purchase_request pr ON ct.ma_pr = pr.ma_pr WHERE ct.ma_pr = #{maPR} AND pr.loai_yeu_cau = 'NHAP';
select sys_id_chi_tiet_nhap_hang, ma_pr, ma_po, sys_id_khach_hang, sys_id_san_pham, so_luong, gia, tong_chi_phi, ngay_nhap_du_kien from chi_tiet_nhap_hang where ma_pr = #{maPR}
SELECT sys_id_chi_tiet_nhap_hang, sys_id_inbound, ma_pr, ma_po, sys_id_khach_hang, sys_id_san_pham, so_luong, gia, tong_chi_phi, ngay_nhap_du_kien FROM chi_tiet_nhap_hang WHERE ma_po = #{maPO};
